mapper.update:
update PHIP_ST_ELEMENT_INFO
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_SOURCE_ID = #{fkSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_TYPE_ID = #{fkTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_DICT_ID = #{fkDictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_FORMAT = #{dataFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
ALLOW_VALUE = #{allowValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFINE = #{define,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_AT=sysdate
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT PSEI.*, PSNSI.NAME SOURCE_NAME, SSDI.NAME TYPE_NAME, PDC.NAME DICT_NAME, PDC.CODE DICT_CODE FROM PHIP_ST_ELEMENT_INFO PSEI LEFT JOIN PHIP_ST_NORM_SOURCE_INFO PSNSI ON PSEI.FK_SOURCE_ID = PSNSI.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_SYSTEM_DICT_ITEM SSDI ON SSDI.ID = PSEI.FK_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN PHIP_DICT_CATALOG PDC ON PSEI.FK_DICT_ID = PDC.ID WHERE 1=1 AND PSEI.ID=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT PSEI.*, PSNSI.NAME SOURCE_NAME, SSDI.NAME TYPE_NAME, PDC.NAME DICT_NAME, PDC.CODE DICT_CODE FROM PHIP_ST_ELEMENT_INFO PSEI LEFT JOIN PHIP_ST_NORM_SOURCE_INFO PSNSI ON PSEI.FK_SOURCE_ID = PSNSI.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_SYSTEM_DICT_ITEM SSDI ON SSDI.ID = PSEI.FK_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN PHIP_DICT_CATALOG PDC ON PSEI.FK_DICT_ID = PDC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(CONCAT(PSEI.CODE,PSEI.NAME)) LIKE UPPER (#{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND PSEI.FK_SOURCE_ID = (#{fkSourceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND PSEI.FK_TYPE_ID = (#{fkTypeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND PSEI.FK_DICT_ID = (#{fkDictId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT PSEI.* from PHIP_ST_ELEMENT_INFO PSEI WHERE UPPER (PSEI.CODE) = UPPER (#{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT ID from PHIP_DICT_CATALOG PDC WHERE UPPER (PDC.CODE) = UPPER (#{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT PSEI.*, PSNSI.NAME SOURCE_NAME FROM PHIP_ST_ELEMENT_INFO PSEI LEFT JOIN PHIP_ST_NORM_SOURCE_INFO PSNSI ON PSEI.FK_SOURCE_ID = PSNSI.ID WHERE PSEI.id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
